about_the_game:
Our journey brings us to a stark landscape, where a crime comes to the attention of one of the region’s brightest minds, the famous Detective Quan. During this journey, he will meet two idiosyncratic leaders with their own agendas, turning what initially seemed like an open-and-shut case into the highlight of his detective career.

The newest and seventh DLC, “A Taste for Trouble”, is a story about people's secret lives and their aspirations. Is everyone who they say they are? Will he find the truth or fail trying? There will be no question unanswered, no stone unturned, and no level uncompleted!

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode, new buildings, and 3 new playable leaders.
